items.content_html:
Summary

Adds missing data for :nth-col() and :nth-last-col() pseudo-classes.

Test results and supporting details

These two selectors are in an identical situation to that of the column combinator (||), i.e. no implementation by any browser yet but having a Firefox bug (Bug 371323).

Related issues

Fully fixes mdn/content#23365.
items.title: Adding `nth-col` and `nth-last-col` data

items.content_html:
This prefixes rather than suffixes permission keys with permission_ so that they will be grouped. Otherwise you end up with the case we have now where the permissions are interleaved with methods - see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Permissions_API#browser_compatibility

This is first part of work on mdn/content#13003. We should also add spec links for each of these permissions, as they are defined in their own specs, but will leave that as a follow up.
items.title: Permissions - reorder permission strings together

items.content_html: This PR removes the irrelevant locale and isAutoLocale members of the IDBIndex API as per the corresponding data guidelines. The lack of current support has been confirmed by the mdn-bcd-collector project (v7.1.2), even if the current BCD suggests support. (See #18551.)
items.title: Remove api.IDBIndex.locale/isAutoLocale from BCD

items.title: Remove PermissionsPolicyViolationReportBody API from BCD

items.content_html:
CSP violation reports sent by Firefox include effective-directive and status-code properties in the payload.

The page referring to the API doesn't exist -> https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/CSPViolationReportBody

Pointing to https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/HTTP/CSP#violation_report_syntax instead

Bugs:

  • https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1192684

Parent issue:

  • mdn/content#22907
items.title: releases(108): Fx 108 adds support for 'effective-directive' and 'status-code' props

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects version values for WebView Android for the pulse member of the GamepadHapticActuator API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v7.1.2). The collector obtains results based upon the latest WebView version (to determine if it is supported), then version numbers are copied from Chrome Android.

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.gooborg.com/tests/api/GamepadHapticActuator/pulse

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
